title: Civil War Veteran Awarded Medal Of Honor, 150 Years Later
teaser: President Obama awarded the Medal of Honor on Thursday to a soldier who stayed at his post under withering fire, 150 years ago. Lt. Alonzo Cushing was just 22, commanding an artillery battery during the final day of the Battle of Gettysburg.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
